item.title: Education
item.description: Singapore University of Technology and Design May 2018 to Aug 2021 Bachelor of Engineering in Engineering Systems and Design, Honours Major in Business Analytics, with a Minor in Artificial Intelligence Recipient of Singtel Exchange Undergraduate Scholarship (SHINE Program) Notable Courses: Statistics, Optimisation, Probability & Data and Business Analytics Zhejiang University May 2019 to Aug 2019 Semester Exchange Recipient of Temasek Foundation international (TFi) Scholarship Took courses in Principles of Big Data and Design - User Experience

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: DataSpark - Data Science Intern June 2020 to Sep 2020 Under Singtel SHINE Programme Identified high value customer segment with feature engineering using Spark 2.0 written in Scala. Derived data sources from UNIX bash shell and hadoop file system. Upkept the documentation of 2 projects ensuring methodology are correctly illustrated for future references. Eatigo - Operations Intern Feb 2018 to March 2018 Managed Salesforce to coordinate the requirements of merchants and users. Took part in Town Hall meetings, which gave me a better understanding of the corporate structure.

item.title: Exploratory Analysis of Data Science and Analytics Job Market in Singapore 2020
item.description: Personal Project - As graduation approaches, I decided that it would be beneficial to get an overview of the Data centred jobs in Singapore. Therefore, I decided to scrap the popular job site, Glassdoor, to gather data on the jobs on the market and have the bigger picture of the job market.

item.title: About
item.description: Passionate about tech. Striving to make this world a better place. Hello there! I’m a technology enthusiast, majoring in Business Analytics with a Minor in Artificial Intelligence at Singapore University of Technology and Design(SUTD). On top of going through the academic routine, I regularly engage myself in personal and external projects and competitions that I believe would enrich my professional and individual life. Iâ€™m a big believer that the university journey is what you make out of it, actively putting yourself out and finding activities and like-minded individuals to develop yourself.

item.title: Statistical Approach to Titanic Accident
item.description: Personal Project - I undertook this project during the start of the penultimate year summer break to hone my knowledge in statistics and analytical thinking.

item.title: Optimising Warehouse Resource Allocation
item.description: Industry Attachment Project - This project was my university industry attachment with PSA International PTE LTD in conjunction with two university modules: (1) Statistics and (2) Manufacturing and Supply Chain Operations.

item.title: Identification of Manufacturing Process Bottlenecks
item.description: Industry Attachment Project - This project was my university industry attachment with TSH Synergy PTE LTD in conjunction with university modules: Data and Business Analytics. By creating a Business Intelligence Dashboard and Data Analysis to expedite the identification of possible bottlenecks.
